content.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?inverse_rel ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE { { <> wdt:P25 ?entity. ?entity wdt:P31 wd:Q5 . BIND(str("has mother") AS ?rel) } UNION { <> wdt:P22 ?entity. ?entity wdt:P31 wd:Q5 . BIND(str("has father") AS ?rel) } UNION { <> wdt:P40 ?entity. ?entity wdt:P31 wd:Q5 . BIND(str("has child") AS ?rel) } UNION {<> wdt:P802 ?entity. ?entity wdt:P31 wd:Q5 . BIND(str("has student") AS ?rel)} UNION {<> ^wdt:P802 ?entity. ?entity wdt:P31 wd:Q5 . BIND(str("has student") AS ?inverse_rel)} UNION {<> wdt:P737/wdt:P737/wdt:P737 ?entity. BIND(str("influenced by") AS ?rel)} UNION {<> ^wdt:P737 ?entity. BIND(str("influenced by") AS ?inverse_rel)}. SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en" } } ORDER BY ?entityLabel

SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?inverse_rel ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE { { <> wdt:P19 ?entity. ?entity wdt:P31/wdt:P279* wd:Q702492 . BIND(str("has place of birth") AS ?rel) } UNION { <> wdt:P20 ?entity. ?entity wdt:P31/wdt:P279* wd:Q702492 . BIND(str("has place of death") AS ?rel) } UNION { <> wdt:P937 ?entity. ?entity wdt:P31/wdt:P279* wd:Q702492 . BIND(str("has work location") AS ?rel) } UNION { <> wdt:P740 ?entity.
